title: Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop M2 Pro chip with 12‑core CPU and 19‑core GPU: 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display, 16GB Unified Memory, 512GB SSD Storage. Works with iPhone/iPad; Space Gray
descriptions:
**Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop - Unleash Your Creativity**

Experience the ultimate in power and portability with the Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop, powered by the M2 Pro chip with 12-core CPU and 19-core GPU. This stunning Space Gray laptop is designed to help you create, collaborate, and bring your ideas to life.

**Breathtaking 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR Display**

Enjoy an unparalleled visual experience with the 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display, featuring Extreme Dynamic Range, over 1000 nits brightness, HDR content, and pro reference modes. Perfect for graphic designers, photographers, and videographers.

**Seamless Performance**

The M2 Pro chip provides lightning-fast performance, with up to 12-core CPU and 19-core GPU, and 16GB unified memory for smooth multitasking. With up to 22 hours of battery life, you can work, create, and play all day long.

**Connect and Collaborate**

Stay connected with your iPhone and iPad using Universal Clipboard, FaceTime calls, and Messages. Plus, enjoy seamless compatibility with Adobe Creative Cloud, Xcode, Affinity Designer, and Microsoft 365.

**Premium Audio and Camera**

Capture stunning 1080p FaceTime HD video and enjoy crystal-clear audio with the three-mic array and six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio.

**All-Day Portability**

Weighing in at just 4.3 pounds, the all-aluminum unibody enclosure is both durable and portable, perfect for working on the go.

**Free Software Updates**

Stay up-to-date with the latest software updates, free for years to come.

**Key Features:**

* M2 Pro chip with 12-core CPU and 19-core GPU
* 16.2-inch Liquid Retina XDR display
* 16GB unified memory and 512GB SSD storage
* Up to 22 hours of battery life
* Magic Keyboard with full-height function key row and Touch ID
* Six-speaker sound system with Spatial Audio
* 1080p FaceTime HD camera
* MagSafe charging, Thunderbolt 4, SDXC card slot, and HDMI
* Wi-Fi 6E and Bluetooth 5.3

**Upgrade Your Creativity**

Order your Apple 2023 MacBook Pro Laptop today and discover a new world of possibilities.
